item.title: Sensr.net Bitcoin Experiment
item.description:
I had a user ask to pay his Sensr.net bill in Bitcoin. We use Stripe to process payments and they don’t yet support Bitcoin. However a friend recommended Coinbase, so I set up a merchant page there where you can pay Sensr.net in Bitcoin.

If you’re interested in paying your Sensr.net bill using Bitcoin, just let us know. If you already have a Sensr.net account, just pay us in Bitcoin and we’ll add the credit to your account.

If you have any questions on this, just drop us an email to billing at Sensr.net.
